defaultMessage: + Scenario
One of the following keywords is received
Respond with
Type exact keywords, separated by commas
Greeting
The first message that is sent to the user. It introduces your organization and the service you provide through this bot. This message is automatically followed by the Main menu.
Hi! Welcome to [Name of your organization]â€™s fact-checking bot. We fact-check claims, videos and images related to topics such as politics, health, finance, and technology.
Main menu
A menu asking the user to choose between a set of options. This message automatically follows the Greeting message.
Main menu: Reply "1" to do something and "2" to do something else.
Secondary menu
An optional menu asking the user to choose from a set of options. When a user replies with one of the options, the bot can send a report or direct them to another bot message.
Secondary menu: Reply "1" to do something and "2" to do something else.
Option not available
The message sent if the user response to a menu is not a valid menu scenario. This message will be automatically followed by the same menu the user saw before this message.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand your message. Please try again!
Query prompt
The message asking the user to submit content for a fact-check. If the user successfully submits content, the bot will reply with the Query received message next.
Please enter your question or reply 0 to go back to main menu.
Query received
If the user successfully submits content, the bot will reply with this message.
Thank you! Your request has been received. Responses are being aggregated and sorted, and we're working on fact-checking your questions.
Report updated
The message sent to the user when status of a report has changed. The report must be completed for this message to be sent.
The fact-check that we sent to you has been *updated* with new information:
Invalid format
Message automatically sent to users when a file received in the query is not supported.
Sorry, we can't accept this type of message for verification at this time.
Notice of inactivity
This message is sent to any user that has sent a message to the tipline when the Check Message bot is set to inactive.
Thank you for your message. Our fact-checking service is currently *inactive*. Contact us at *[email or other contact]* for further inquiries.
Check this box to disable the service. This makes the Check Message bot inactive: it will reply with ONLY the message below when a user interacts with the bot.
Terms of service
This message immediately follows any report sent to the user and should contain a link to the Check Terms of Service
The software that powers this tipline, Check Message, is provided to you under these [link to Terms of Service].
Main Scenario
Settings
Create your bot
Select a report
Search for the title of an item in order to send the report associated with it. The report must be completed (Final status) in order to be found
